summary: Personal consistency tracker web app with monthly tabs and daily habit checkboxes, progress charts, habit weekly frequency goals, optional numeric volume logging with units (time/reps/km/none), editable habit names/units/frequency, diary reflections module, investments goals module, and export data (XLSX/PDF) â€” using Internet Identity for cross-device persistence.
architectural_notes: Auth uses Internet Identity; user data should persist across logouts/devices/upgrades via stable on-chain storage keyed by principal.
Actor initialization should not require a URL-provided adminToken/secret (remove _initializeAccessControlWithSecret(adminToken)) to avoid startup/init failures.
known_issues: Production/draft deployments intermittently fail with generic 'Deployment error' and no detailed logs available to user.
App can get stuck on initialization/authenticated init due to backend actor initialization failures (e.g., 'Authenticated init problem detected', backend reachability check hanging).

existing_features.title: Restore and redeploy the full application (frontend and backend) to the exact code and configuration of Version 35, replacing the currently deployed Version 36.

After restoring Version 35, verify end-to-end initialization works for an authenticated user: Internet Identity login completes, the backend actor becomes available, and the app proceeds past initialization to the normal UI (Profile Setup for new users or the Dashboard for existing users) without getting stuck on the loading watchdog/timeout screen.

projectName: Restore app to Version 35 (last working build)
